SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc28
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc28.model.actions

Class ActionManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc28.model.actions.ActionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ActionManager extends Object implements Serializable
This class manages the playerOfTurn and actionType lifecycle. It's responsible for updating them accordingly so that it simplifies the Game Class considerably
See Also:
